experience.title: The Burning Reef
experience.description: My final project dissertation for (Bsc) Digital Media at UWE. An interactive narative driven audio-visual experience for the web, generated using Three.JS to procedurally generate in WebGL the dynamic environment. The project is an exploration into the effects of a dynamic ambience meant to demonstrate the effects of ocean degradation and elicit and emotional response from users while they explore and collect artefacts that reveal information about the causes of the degrading oceans. The aim of the project is to discover if by eliciting an emotional response, users are more willing to change their lifestyle or opinion of ocean degradation. Effectiveness of the project is measured by user research findings, which proved it to be effective at elliciting an emotional response.
experience.roles: Javascript Developer, 3D Artist, User Experience Designer

experience.title: LIVE FEED
experience.description: A piece of Speculation design aiming to explore how the ownership of media portraying poverty might change given the creation of a system that would give control of the portrayal to those actually in poverty. A 3D interface streaming booth setup in a foodbank and an accompanying app prototype made in Figma allows those in poverty to safely present themselves to the general public through a media streaming platform

experience.title: Carbon Visualisation

experience.title: Echo Architect
